A novel URL Shortcut Tool

Welcome!! This is REWQ - a very simple idea. It is a shortcut url for any longer, frequently visited url.

R_E_W_Q are top 4 letters on your keyboard and you can kind of swipe to enter them.

Whenever, you swipe on your keyboard these 4 letters 'r-e-w-q-TAB'/NAME - we will redirect you to the link from below.

Setup your shortcuts here

Always save after editing.

Tips

You need to save if you change any value above.

Take a backup in by copying into Notes. Title it `#rewq links`.

Use from CLI

Add below to your bash profile.

rewq() { open https://rewq.app?$1; }

Now, rewq standup (for example) will open standup link in browser.

Feedback

Write to me flipflopapps@gmail.com (I am Naval Saini).

Try out my other app (a chess variation) - halfchess.com

Don't forget to tell about this to others.

Syntax

+ [Shortcut Name] [list | shortcut | random | sequence]
[Optional URL Name] [URL]
[Optional URL Name] [URL]

+ for new lists, shortcuts or other accessing ways
- or # for comments
Url name or Shortcut name should not have spaces.

Example (My config)

# rewq links

+ standup shortcut

https://meet.google.com/abc-abc-abc

+ workouts list

Kettle-Bells https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r6qHV7jnJEE&list=PLoy7IsGb6mC1x05KfrmpfsdMlff_fDtQd
Dip-Station https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=W8jXc1zaLuQ&list=PLoy7IsGb6mC2_fgATd8TV3uQayi9-qsML
Exercises https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cuLwdV_yXpk&list=PLoy7IsGb6mC0TJbFGcTvHWaiOUu7b3Ill
+ flute list

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AYlriSH28Og
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=y8FNGwoZ5P0

+ rewq shortcut
https://app.netlify.com/sites/rewq/

Results

Saving above creates following shortcuts on browser URL.

rewq.app/standup
rewq.app/flute
rewq.app/workouts
rewq.app/rewq
